name: Queer Space Pirates - Episode One
description:
Exploring space and sexuality! 🚀🌈

QSP is a narrative point and click game. Use the left mouse button to click on objects and characters throughout the scenes and progress through dialogue. The escape key opens up a pause menu where you can restart or quit the game.

This first prototype of Episode One introduces one of the Queer Space Pirates, Apollo. You'll learn a little about his adventures and how he found himself out amongst the stars!

Created by Nathaniel (@natbott), Claire (@Cookie011019), Alex (@speepy_boy), and Wei (hey_iew).
Audio by Avery (@maruzaibatsu)
Content and Narrative Consulting by Avery and Ruby (@RubyQuailDesign)
